abstract: Amar'e Stoudemire predicted that owners and players would soon make a deal, but also said that the players might eventually form their own league.
snippet: Amar'e Stoudemire predicted that owners and players would soon make a deal, but also said that the players might eventually form their own league.
lead_paragraph: Less than 24 hours after Commissioner David Stern canceled the first two weeks of the regular season, Amar'e Stoudemire said that N.B.A. players were eager to play as soon as possible.

headline.main: Stoudemire Hopes for Quick Resolution to Lockout
